description.en: Gives +3% Block Penetration when applied to a pierced weapon or shield.
description.ar: Gives +3% Block Penetration when applied to a pierced weapon or shield.
description.br: Concede um aumento de +3% de Penetração de Bloqueio quando aplicada em Arma ou Escudo perfurado.
description.cns: +3%格挡穿透(放置在武器或盾牌穿洞槽时)
description.de: Verleiht +3% Block Penetration, wenn angewendet auf eine gesockelte Waffe oder Schild.
description.fi: Gives +3% Block Penetration when applied to a pierced weapon or shield.
description.fil: Gives +3% Block Penetration when applied to a pierced weapon or shield.
description.fr: Pénétration de Blocage augmentée de +3%, en glissant la carte dans un emplacement percé de votre arme ou armure.
description.id: Memberikan +3% Penetrasi Blok saat diterapkan pada senjata atau perisai yang ditembus.
description.it: Gives +3% Block Penetration when applied to a pierced weapon or shield.
description.jp: 武器や盾に装着するとブロック貫通力+3%
description.kr: Gives +3% Block Penetration when applied to a pierced weapon or shield.
description.nl: Gives +3% Block Penetration when applied to a pierced weapon or shield.
description.pl: Gives +3% Block Penetration when applied to a pierced weapon or shield.

description.sp: Otorga +3 % Bloqueo de Penetración al usarlo en un arma o escudo Perforado.

description.th: โอกาสการเจาะบล็อค +3% เมื่อใส่ลงในอาวุธหรือโล่ที่ถูกเจาะแล้ว
description.tw: 當應用於精煉武器或盾牌時，提供 +3% 格擋穿透。
